fetType.description: type of pass FET in a device

loadSwitchCount.description: number of load switches in the package

vin.description: input voltage under which a device can be expected to reliably operate

outputCurrent.description: continuous DC current supported by a device

onResistance.comment: conditions includes vin and output current

pullDownResistance.description: pull-down resistance of a device from the output to the ground

currentLimitSupport.description: whether a device supports current limiting

adjustableRiseTimeSupport.description: whether a device supports adjustable rise time

quickOutputDischargeSupport.description: whether a device supports quick output discharge

reverseCurrentBlockingSupport.description: whether a device supports reverse current blocking

powerGoodSupport.description: whether a device supports power good

enableTime.description: time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal
enableTime.comment: conditions include output capacitor value, vin

offTime.description: time between enable deasserted and output voltage falling to 90% nominal
offTime.comment: conditions include output capacitor value, vin

rampTime.description: time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal
rampTime.comment: conditions include output capacitor value, vin

fallTime.description: time for output voltage to go from 90% vout nominal to 10% vout nominal
fallTime.comment: conditions include output capacitor value, current output, and vin

currentConsumption.description: current used by device in various power modes

componentProtectionThresholds.description: thermal and power supply protection thresholds of a device
